Time frames should be s u ffic iently fle xible to ta ke account o f the d i fference s i n the comple xity o f d i s pute s and the d i fferent needs and expectations of parties in a particular dispute. Time frames can be affected by applicable legal requirements. The parties and the provider share accountability for compliance with established time frames. It is also helpful if the progress of the dispute is tracked and the parties are informed of the progress, or such tracking information is made available to the parties and to the dispute resolvers.
